statement.p: The diagram below shows a triangle inscribed in a rectangle. The rectangle has width \displaystyle{9.00} yd and height \displaystyle{6.00} yd. One side of the triangle is a long side of the rectangle. The other triangle sides have lengths \displaystyle{7.21} yd and \displaystyle{7.81} yd.
What is the area of the shaded, inscribed triangle? yd²
What is the area of the rectangle? yd²
What is the area of the unshaded parts of the rectangle? yd²
